Eka#yA&stuvata praqjA a#dhIyanta praqjApa#tiqradhi#patirAsIt tiqsRuBi#rastuvataq brahmA#sRujyataq brahma#Naqspatiq-radhi#patirAsIt paq~jcaBi#rastuvata BUqtAnya#sRujyanta BUqtAnAqM patiqradhi#patirAsIth saqptaBi#rastuvata 
saptaqrq.ShayO#&sRujyanta dhAqtA-dhi#patirAsI-nnaqvaBi#rastuvata piqtarO#-&sRujyaqntA-&*di#tiqradhi#patnyAsI-dEkAdaqSaBi#-rastuvataqrtavO#& sRujyantA- &&rtaqvO-&dhi#pati-rAsIt trayOdaqSaBi#-rastuvataq mAsA# asRujyanta saM~MvathsaqrO&dhi#pati- [  ] 18
